channel.title: Workarounds on Documentation for the Alchemist Simulator
channel.description: Recent content in Workarounds on Documentation for the Alchemist Simulator

item.title: Graphical Glitches in Swing
item.description: Known issues with Swing and OpenGL acceleration, especially with legacy AMD/ATi drivers.

item.title: Memory leaks under Linux
item.description: Known issue of some Java Virtual Machine implementations when requested to use more than 64GB of RAM
